notice:
Once again, I need to apologize to you all! Wordsmith version 1.11.0 has a major bug in the new Word Usage Statistics feature that causes a crash.
It's entirely my fault and I'm super sorry that this happened.
Version 1.11.1 fixes this crash and is already submitted for review to the Dalamud team.
I'm super sorry that this bug happened and I'll try to do better in the future!
